meanings.definition: The quality or state of being separable.
meanings.sent1: The separabilities of the puzzle pieces made it easy to put together.
meanings.sent2: The separabilities of the ingredients allowed for easy customization of the dish.
meanings.sent3: The separabilities of the socks led to a funny mix-up in the laundry.
meanings.sent4: The separabilities of the colors in the painting created a striking contrast.
meanings.sent5: The separabilities of the keys on the keyboard made typing a breeze.

meanings.definition: The ability to be separated or divided.
meanings.sent1: The separabilities of the sections in the notebook made it easy to organize.
meanings.sent2: The separabilities of the tasks helped in prioritizing the workload.
meanings.sent3: The separabilities of the flavors in the ice cream led to a delicious taste test.
meanings.sent4: The separabilities of the teams in the competition made for an interesting match.
meanings.sent5: The separabilities of the strands in the rope ensured its flexibility.
